data.text: @MayorBowser It’s transmission of a very mild variant with zero hospitalizations. Why are you calling it “Substantial” when even the CDC has changed their criteria?
@MayorBowser Only one state, Hawaii, and the District of Columbia have yet to set an end date for their school mask requirements.

@MayorBowser Explain this “self-reported probable cases”. Is this just fancy vernacular for “unreliable testing”? I am running a word-of-mouth campaign for residents to vote you out, Muriel. You’re done. Look out for my run next election cycle. Be better.

@MayorBowser On what planet is this "substantial transmission"?

So glad @potus is declaring this all 9ver tomorrow
